Package restaurant

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • restaurant.Table
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Table>
    public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Table>, java.io.Serializable
    Represents a table in the restaurant.
    Author:
    Chen Xingyu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int capacity
      capacity of the table
      private int id
      id for the table
      private boolean isAvail
      indication of whether there are customers dining at the table
      private java.time.LocalDateTime nextAvailTime
      next available time for the table after it is assigned, assuming the table will be vacated 2 hours later

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Table​(int id, int capacity)
      create a new table with given id and capacity

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void assign()
      assign a table for customers to dine in
      boolean checkAvail​(java.time.LocalDateTime time, int pax)
      check whether the table can be assigned to the given number of customers for dining in or making reservations based on two conditions
      - the capacity of the table is larger than the number of people dining - no customers are using the table now or the table is expected to be vacated before the given time
      int compareTo​(Table t)
      compare the capacity of tables
      boolean getAvail()
      get whether there are customers dining at the table
      int getID()
      get the id of the table
      void vacate()
      vacate the table when the customers have checked out

    • Constructor Detail

      • Table

        public Table​(int id,
             int capacity)
        create a new table with given id and capacity
        Parameters:

        capacity - capacity of the table

    • Method Detail

      • getAvail

        public boolean getAvail()
        get whether there are customers dining at the table
        Returns:
        return true if the table is available, false if the table is occupied by customers

      • getID

        public int getID()
        get the id of the table
        Returns:
        id of the table

      • checkAvail

        public boolean checkAvail​(java.time.LocalDateTime time,
                          int pax)
        check whether the table can be assigned to the given number of customers for dining in or making reservations based on two conditions
        - the capacity of the table is larger than the number of people dining - no customers are using the table now or the table is expected to be vacated before the given time
        Parameters:
        time - the given time to check availability
        pax - number of people dining
        Returns:
        return true if both conditions are satisfied, false otherwise

      • assign

        public void assign()
        assign a table for customers to dine in

      • vacate

        public void vacate()
        vacate the table when the customers have checked out

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Table t)
        compare the capacity of tables
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Table>
